name: Might and Magic 5: Darkside of Xeen
name_original: Might and Magic 5: Darkside of Xeen
description:
Might and Magic 5: Darkside of Xeen is a RPG game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 01-01-1993. It was published by New World Computing. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Might and Magic 5: Darkside of Xeen is available on PC.
It was directed by Jon Van Caneghem.
